A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not understanding how people oversaw the lack of direction and lack of character development of this chapter. Star Wars was the franchise that knows how to develop well-crafted stories but this chapter was the exception. Let me just remind you all: This is an opinion of mine. Everyone is entitled to one. I've been a fan for decades but this one seriously sticks out like a sore thumb in the lack of the great story telling I know and love.
